sentence.Network_en: To complicate matters further, everybody's vitamin requirements vary.
sentence.Network_cn: 更麻烦的是，每个人对维生素的需求量是不同的。

sentence.Network_en: I do not wish to complicate the task more than is necessary.
sentence.Network_cn: 我不想使这项任务不必要地复杂化。

sentence.Network_en: These events will greatly complicate the situation.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些事件将使局势变得极其复杂.

这麽复杂（complicated）、综合（comprehensive）、多层（complex）的问题，肯定没有一揽子解决方案；只能一个案例一个案例 …
英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(29) _ 上海疯狂英语 ... complication 复杂 complice 同伙 complicity 同谋.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent. (in the sense 'combine, entangle, intertwine'): from Latin complicat- 'folded together', from the verb complicare, from com- 'together' + plicare 'to fold'

entry.def: To complicate something means to make it more difficult to understand or deal with.

example.ex: What complicates the issue is the burden of history...
example.tran: 历史的重负使问题复杂化了。

example.ex: The day's events, he said, would only complicate the task of the peacekeeping forces...
example.tran: 他说白天发生的事件只会使维和部队的任务更为复杂。

sentences.sentence: "There was a new development that complicated the matter"

means.word_mean: 2. make more complex, intricate, or richer;

auth_sentence.content: I don't think we need to complicate things.
auth_sentence.res_content: I don't think we need to complicate things.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I don't think we need to complicate things.

auth_sentence.content: Iran's geography would also complicate an air war.
auth_sentence.res_content: Iran's geography would also complicate an air war.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Iran's geography would also complicate an air war.

auth_sentence.content: Now let's complicate things just a bit more.
auth_sentence.res_content: Now let's complicate things just a bit more.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Now let's complicate things just a bit more.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. =fold,表示"重叠,重复"; 2. 折; 3. 弯

stems_affixes.word_buile: complicate使..复杂+ed……的→adj.复杂的, 难解的
ex出+plic重叠,重复+able可以……的→能把重叠的东西弄出来→可解释的→explicate形容词
im进入+plic重叠+it→进入重叠→不直说→含蓄的
ac加强+com+plic重叠,重复+e→共同重叠在一起做事→同谋
complicate弄复杂+ion表名词→complication复杂,纠纷
com共同+plic重叠,重复+ity表名词→共同重叠→同谋的关系
re再+plic重叠,重复+a表名词→再重叠[一分]的[东西]→复制品
com全部+plic重叠,重复+ate使……→全部重叠起来→弄复杂
ex出+plic重叠,重复+ate使……→把重叠的东西弄出来→解释
ex出,往外+ploit=plic重叠+it→把折叠之物展开→使用

stems_affixes.value_cn: 牵连[于罪行中],含蓄表达
stems_affixes.word_buile: im进入+plic重叠,重复+ate表动词→[说话]进入重叠,不直说→含蓄表达
re再+plic重叠,重复+ate表动词→再重叠[一分]→复制

Sentence.sentence: Already, by paying close attention to and interacting with the world and people around him, and without any school-type formal instruction, he has done a task far more difficult, complicated and abstract than anything he will be asked to do in school, or than any of his teachers has done for years.

And while he has been doing this, he has been learning other things as well, including many of the concepts that the schools think only they can teach him, and many that are more complicated than the ones they do try to teach him
The problem is more complicated than I thought.
He has tackled more complicated problems than this
The full details are complicated - the text alone runs to 385 pages– and trying to summarise it is no easy task.

sentences.en: These events will greatly complicate the situation.
sentences.cn: 这些事件将使局势变得极其复杂。

sentences.en: There is no need to complicate matters.
sentences.cn: 没有必要使问题复杂化。
